name: BITTER
descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) is a suspected South Asian cyber espionage threat group that has been active since at least 2013. [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has targeted government, energy, and engineering organizations in Pakistan, China, Bangladesh, and Saudi Arabia.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

subtechniques.name: Domains
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has registered a variety of domains to host malicious payloads and for C2.(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

subtechniques.name: Web Protocols
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has used HTTP POST requests for C2.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Dynamic Resolution
technique_table_data.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has used DDNS for C2 communications.(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Encrypted Channel
technique_table_data.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has encrypted their C2 communications.(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Exploitation for Client Execution
technique_table_data.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has exploited Microsoft Office vulnerabilities CVE-2012-0158, CVE-2017-11882, CVE-2018-0798, and CVE-2018-0802.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Exploitation for Privilege Escalation
technique_table_data.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has exploited CVE-2021-1732 for privilege escalation.(Citation: DBAPPSecurity BITTER zero-day Feb 2021)(Citation: Microsoft CVE-2021-1732 Feb 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Ingress Tool Transfer
technique_table_data.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has downloaded additional malware and tools onto a compromised host.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

subtechniques.name: Dynamic Data Exchange
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has executed OLE objects using Microsoft Equation Editor to download and run malicious payloads.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)

subtechniques.name: Masquerade Task or Service
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has disguised malware as a Windows Security update service.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)

technique_table_data.name: Non-Application Layer Protocol
technique_table_data.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has used TCP for C2 communications.(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

subtechniques.name: Encrypted/Encoded File
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has used a RAR SFX dropper to deliver malware.(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

subtechniques.name: Tool
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has obtained tools such as PuTTY for use in their operations.(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

subtechniques.name: Spearphishing Attachment
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has sent spearphishing emails with a malicious RTF document or Excel spreadsheet.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

technique_table_data.name: Phishing
technique_table_data.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has delivered malicious applications to victims via shortened URLs distributed through SMS, WhatsApp, and various social media platforms.(Citation: blackberry_mobile_malware_apt_esp)

subtechniques.name: Scheduled Task
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has used scheduled tasks for persistence and execution.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)

subtechniques.name: Upload Malware
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has registered domains to stage payloads.(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)

subtechniques.name: Malicious File
subtechniques.descr: [BITTER](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1002) has attempted to lure victims into opening malicious attachments delivered via spearphishing.(Citation: Cisco Talos Bitter Bangladesh May 2022)(Citation: Forcepoint BITTER Pakistan Oct 2016)
